action.action-desc: Mr. Reichert (for himself, Mr. McDermott, Mr. Dold, Mr. Pascrell, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, and Mr. Valadao) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve and make permanent the above-the-line deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Educator Tax Relief Act of 2015.

section.header: Deduction for certain expenses of school teachers

subsection.text: Section 62(a)(2)(D) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking In the case of taxable years beginning during 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, or 2014, the deductions and inserting The deductions.
Section 62(d) of such Code is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: In the case of any taxable year beginning after 2014, the $250 amount in subsection (a)(2)(D) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

subparagraph.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year in which the taxable year begins, determined by substituting calendar year 2013 for calendar year 1992 in subparagraph (B) thereof.

paragraph.continuation-text: Any increase determined under the preceding sentence shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of $50.

subsection.text: Section 62(a)(2)(D) of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking educator in connection and all that follows and inserting educator—, and
by inserting at the end the following:

clause.text: by reason of the participation of the educator in professional development courses related to the curriculum in which the educator provides instruction or to the students for which the educator provides instruction, and

in connection with books, supplies (other than nonathletic supplies for courses of instruction in health or physical education), computer equipment (including related software and services) and other equipment, and supplementary materials used by the eligible educator in the classroom.

subsection.text: Section 62(d)(1)(A) of such Code is amended by inserting ending during the taxable year before the period.

paragraph.text: The amendments made by subsections (a), (b), and (c) shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014.
The amendment made by subsection (d) shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2001.
